info.brief_description: You visit the hot springs planet Tenrei and run into the crew of the Outlaw Star.
info.description:
You visit the hot springs planet Tenrei from episode 23 and run into the crew of the Outlaw Star. What happens next is up to you.

-Sex encouraged.
-No killing of characters.
-Gay/Lesbian allowed.
-Vore is allowed, just no digestion.
-Unbirth okay.

Feel free to add as much as you like. In the first chapter, other refers to any species you want, from any work that you know. Specific character works the same way. They may even be a character of your own creation. I only ask that you always leave 'other' as an option for people that have ides for those that someone may not have thought of already. Thank you and enjoy.
Some specifics about the Outlaw Star crew.

Thank you to everyone for the 100th view.

-Gene Starwind: Terran(human) 6' tall, womanizer, red hair, fiery spirit, temper to match. Will always help those who truly need it, but is a sucker for a cute face.

-Aisha Clanclan: Ctarl-ctarl(Catpeople) 5'8" tall, super strong, cream-colored hair, can be very unpredictable.

-Twilight Suzuka: Terran 5'3" tall, swordswoman, calm demeanor, level-headed, has extreme grudge against a group called the Kei Pirates for killing her family.
